item.title: 诺和诺德动荡一周抹去Wegovy带来的最后涨幅
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德公司因减肥需求带来的收益增长已正式成为历史。【原文：The weight loss-fueled gains of Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk A/S are officially a thing of the past.】

item.title: 欧盟推进与南共市贸易协定，迈出"临时性"一步
item.description: 欧盟将暂时适用其与南美国家南方共同市场集团的贸易协定，此举压过了部分议员的担忧——这些议员已将该协定提交至欧盟最高法院进行审查。【原文：The European Union will provisionally apply its trade deal with the Mercosur group of South American countries, overriding concern from some lawmakers who have sent the deal for a test at the bloc’s top court.】

item.title: 德意志银行的埃普斯坦档案将家族办公室推向公众视野
item.description: 在美政府针对杰弗里·爱泼斯坦案调查中披露的材料宝库里，有一批德意志银行的文件，揭开了全球金融界最隐秘角落之一的面纱。【原文：Among the trove of material released as part of the US government’s Jeffrey Epstein investigation is a stash of Deutsche Bank AG files that shed light on one of global finance’s most private corners.】

item.title: 快钱基金抛售美股转投避风港，市场恐慌情绪加剧
item.description: 近期席卷美国股市的剧烈波动已迫使部分量化投资经理完全撤出股票市场，转而投向风险较低的资产。【原文：The latest bout of volatility lashing US stocks has driven some quantitative investment managers completely out of equities and into less risky assets.】

item.title: 英伟达看似价值股，即便其盈利数据正高喊增长
item.description: 英伟达公司周三公布了超预期的财报，成为市场上最具增长潜力的企业之一。那么，为何其股价表现却像一只价值股？【原文：Nvidia Corp. has one of the strongest growth stories in the market after posting blowout earnings on Wednesday. So why is it trading at a level that looks like a value stock?】

item.title: 中国雅虎在津巴布韦启动硫酸锂工厂建设
item.description: 四川雅化工业集团有限公司表示，已开始在津巴布韦建设硫酸锂工厂。随着这个南部非洲国家推动矿业投资者升级加工业务，该项目应运而生。【原文：Sichuan Yahua Industrial Group Co. said it has started building a lithium sulfate plant in Zimbabwe as the southern African country pushes mining investors to upgrade their processing operations.】

item.title: 印尼暂停普拉博沃订购印度卡车的巨额订单
item.description: 印度尼西亚因政策制定者的反对，已暂停向印度塔塔汽车公司和马恒达集团订购10.5万辆卡车的订单。【原文：Indonesia is halting an order for 105,000 trucks from India’s Tata Motors Ltd. and Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. following pushback from policymakers.】

item.title: 印度疫苗制造商巴拉特生物技术公司据称正考虑进行5亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度疫苗开发商巴拉特生物技术国际有限公司正考虑进行首次公开募股，预计融资额可能超过5亿美元。【原文：Indian vaccine developer Bharat Biotech International Ltd. is considering an initial public offering that may raise more than $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 道达尔能源在迪拜窗口期购入大量中东原油
item.description: 道达尔能源公司本月通过一个有助于确定中东地区迪拜原油基准价格的交易窗口，购入了创纪录数量的中东原油。【原文：TotalEnergies SE bought a bumper volume of Middle East crudes this month on a trading window that helps to set the price of the regional Dubai oil benchmark.】

item.title: 推动黄金突破5000美元大关的买家
item.description:
贵金属不再是"藏在床垫下"的资产，正吸引着全球范围内一批全新的交易者。

item.title: 在获得对冲基金青睐后，英国洪水再保险公司计划发行更多巨灾债券
item.description: 英国应对洪水损失的终极保障机制计划更多地依靠资本市场，此前其首只巨灾债券吸引了包括对冲基金费马资本管理公司在内的专业投资者的浓厚兴趣。【原文：Britain’s ultimate backstop against flood-related losses is planning to rely more on the capital markets, after its first ever catastrophe bond drew a lot of interest from specialist investors including hedge fund Fermat Capital Management.】

item.title: 美国国债重拾避险资产优势，创年内最佳月度表现
item.description: 在全球风险上升的背景下，美国国债正迎来一年来最佳月度表现，需求复苏证明投资者仍将美国国债视为动荡时期的首选避风港。【原文：US bonds are wrapping up their best monthly performance in a year against a backdrop of rising global risks, with resurgent demand serving as proof that investors still see Treasuries as the premier haven in turbulent times.】

item.title: 清洁能源开发商ThomasLloyd将通过SPAC交易上市
item.description: 托马斯·劳埃德气候解决方案公司已同意与一家空白支票公司合并，此项交易将使这家总部位于欧洲的清洁能源开发商得以进入蓬勃发展的美国数据中心供电市场。【原文：ThomasLloyd Climate Solutions has agreed to merge with a blank-check company in a deal that will allow the European-based clean energy developer to enter the booming US market for powering data centers.】

item.title: 英国2月对欧盟天然气出口创三年来季节性新高
item.description: 英国2月份对欧洲大陆的天然气出口量升至2023年以来同期最高水平，得益于充足的供应和温和的气候。【原文：Natural gas exports from the UK to continental Europe in February rose to the highest level for this time of year since 2023, as the country benefited from ample supply and milder weather.】

item.title: 图斯克称欧盟贷款不会影响波兰与美国的防务协议
item.description: 欧盟的防务贷款计划不会影响波兰采购美国武器，也不会影响华沙与华盛顿之间的合作，总理唐纳德·图斯克周五表示。【原文：The European Union’s defense loan program won’t affect Polish purchases of US weapons or cooperation between Warsaw and Washington, Prime Minister Donald Tusk said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国暂停对加拿大菜籽粕加征关税，贸易关系持续回暖
item.description: 中国表示将取消对加拿大菜籽粕和龙虾的关税，此举将缓解农业贸易中断问题，此前加拿大总理马克·卡尼于一月访问中国。【原文：China said it would drop tariffs on Canadian rapeseed meal and lobsters, easing disruptions to agricultural trade after Prime Minister Mark Carney’s January visit.】

item.title: 印度与美国展开谈判，法院推翻特朗普全面关税令
item.description: 印度商业和工业部长皮尤什·戈亚尔周五表示，印度正就不断变化的关税形势与美国进行磋商，并将确保在近期达成的贸易协议框架下维护自身利益。【原文：India is in discussions with the US on the evolving tariff situation and will ensure that its interests are protected under the recently concluded trade deal, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal said on Friday.】

item.title: 威兹航空股价下跌，因主要投资者抛售10%股权
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司股价创下7月以来最大跌幅，此前其主要股东出售了这家廉价航空公司10%的股权。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc stock fell the most since July after its key shareholder sold a 10% stake in the budget carrier.】

item.title: 匈牙利、斯洛伐克要求乌克兰允许管道检查团队入境
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托·奥尔班在与斯洛伐克总理罗伯特·菲科通电话后表示，匈牙利和斯洛伐克正寻求派遣一支检查组前往乌克兰，以评估"友谊"输油管道的状况。【原文：Hungary and Slovakia are seeking to send a team of inspectors to Ukraine to examine the condition of the Druzhba oil pipeline, Prime Minister Viktor Orban said after a phone call with his Slovak counterpart Robert Fico.】

item.title: 中东航空公司正就空客客机展开谈判，随着旅行需求复苏
item.description: 黎巴嫩国家航空公司正就扩大其空客飞机机队规模进行谈判，旨在把握需求增长机遇，并为其新成立的低成本子公司拓展运力。【原文：Lebanon’s national airline is in talks to expand its fleet of Airbus SE jets to capitalize on increased demand and to build out its new low-cost subsidiary.】

item.title: 中国出台新规 加速支持离岸人民币融资
item.description: 中国央行宣布了一套新规，旨在促进境内外金融机构之间的跨境人民币融资，为推动人民币在海外的使用铺平道路。【原文：China’s central bank announced a new set of rules to facilitate cross-border yuan funding between local and foreign financial institutions, paving the way to boost the currency’s usage abroad.】

item.title: Ukraine Bondholders Seek Improved Terms After GDP Warrant Swap
item.description: Some holders of Ukraine’s dollar bonds are exploring ways to win more favorable terms from the government, arguing that last year’s restructuring of GDP-linked securities undermined their position, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Pound Hits Two-Month Low Versus Euro as UK Politics Spurs Hedges
item.description: The pound fell to its lowest level against the euro in more than two months and traders paid for protection against further losses after a special election in Manchester signaled trouble ahead for the governing Labour Party.

item.title: New World Development Posts First-Half Loss as Woes Persist
item.description: New World Development Co. posted a loss in the first half as Hong Kong’s property downturn continued to weigh on the distressed developer.

item.title: 芬兰经济因投资与支出增长摆脱衰退
item.description: 芬兰疲软的经济在2025年末摆脱衰退，投资和家庭消费的增长推动了逾一年来最快的扩张。【原文：Finland’s ailing economy emerged from a recession at the end of 2025 as rising investment and household consumption drove the fastest expansion in more than a year.】

item.title: European Stocks Eye Longest Monthly Winning Streak Since 2013
item.description: European shares kicked off February’s final trading session on course for the longest monthly winning streak since 2013, with the region increasingly popular among investors seeking an alternative to the US.

item.title: Rightmove CEO Sees AI Opportunities, Says Peers Will Survive
item.description: Rightmove Plc and its property portal peers will survive the artificial intelligence wave, with the technology presenting more of an opportunity than a threat for the sector, according to Chief Executive Officer Johan Svanstrom.
